title: (x) Looking for a font similar to the Vanity Fair logo - Blakely {Dav}
content:
A quick search here told me that the Vanity Fair logo was custom. Who could show me the wa to a close match?

thanks  
ea
author: ea

comments.content:
_Yea, [Custom Lettering](http://web.archive.org/web/20091126054424/http:/www.terminaldesign.com/lettering_pub_mast.shtml), by James Montalbano.._  
’ [Blakely](http://web.archive.org/web/20091126054424/http:/www.ms-studio.com/FontSales/blakely.html)’, by Mark Simonson, may be an alternate..

Dav, [formlos](http://web.archive.org/web/20091126054424/http:/www.formlos.net/)
